sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useToast } from '../contexts/ToastContext'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { showSuccess, showError } = useToast(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalComplaints: 0, pendingComplaints: 0, inProgressComplaints: 0, resolvedComplaints: 0, totalUsers: 0, activeVolunteers: 0, totalTasks: 0, completedTasks: 0 }); const [recentComplaints, setRecentComplaints] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Mock data for demonstration const mockStats = { totalComplaints: 156, pendingComplaints: 23, inProgressComplaints: 45, resolvedComplaints: 88, totalUsers: 1247, activeVolunteers: 89, totalTasks: 67, completedTasks: 52 }; const mockRecentComplaints = [ { id: 1, title: 'Broken Street Light on Main Road', category: 'streetlight', status: 'pending', priority: 'high', location: 'Main Road, Dhaka', submittedAt: '2024-01-18T10:30:00Z', submittedBy: 'Ahmed Khan', contactInfo: '+880 1712 345 678' }, { id: 2, title: 'Garbage Pile on Sidewalk', category: 'garbage', status: 'in-progress', priority: 'medium', location: 'Park Street, Dhaka', submittedAt: '2024-01-17T14:20:00Z', submittedBy: 'Fatima Begum', contactInfo: '+880 1812 345 678' }, { id: 3, title: 'Pothole on Bridge Road', category: 'road', status: 'pending', priority: 'urgent', location: 'Bridge Road, Dhaka', submittedAt: '2024-01-18T12:20:00Z', submittedBy: 'Rahim Ali', contactInfo: '+880 1912 345 678' }, { id: 4, title: 'Power Outage in Residential Area', category: 'power', status: 'resolved', priority: 'high', location: 'Residential Area, Dhaka', submittedAt: '2024-01-16T08:45:00Z', submittedBy: 'Sara Ahmed', contactInfo: '+880 1612 345 678' } ]; useEffect(() => { // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { setStats(mockStats); setRecentComplaints(mockRecentComplaints); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }, []); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'pending': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'in-progress': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; case 'resolved': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'rejected': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'urgent': return 'text-red-800 bg-red-100'; case 'high': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50'; case 'medium': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-50'; case 'low': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-50'; } }; const getCategoryIcon = (category) => { const icons = { road: 'ðŸ›£ï¸', power: 'âš¡', flooding: 'ðŸŒŠ', garbage: 'ðŸ—‘ï¸', water: 'ðŸ’§', streetlight: 'ðŸ’¡', safety: 'ðŸš¨', other: 'ðŸ“‹' }; return icons[category] || 'ðŸ“‹'; }; const handleAssignTask = (complaintId) => { showSuccess(`Task assigned for complaint #${complaintId}`); }; const handleUpdateStatus = (complaintId, newStatus) => { showSuccess(`Status updated to ${newStatus} for complaint #${complaintId}`); }; if (loading) { return (

Loading admin dashboard...

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Dashboard

Manage complaints, users, and tasks across all 64 districts of Bangladesh

{/* Stats Overview */}
{stats.totalComplaints}
Total Complaints
Across all districts
{stats.pendingComplaints}
Pending
Need attention
{stats.totalUsers}
Registered Users
Citizens & volunteers
{stats.resolvedComplaints}
Resolved
Successfully completed
{/* Quick Actions */}

Manage Complaints

View and manage all complaints

User Management

Manage users and volunteers

Task Management

Create and assign tasks

{/* Recent Complaints */}

Recent Complaints

View All â†’
{recentComplaints.map((complaint) => (
{getCategoryIcon(complaint.category)}

{complaint.title}

{complaint.location}

By: {complaint.submittedBy} Contact: {complaint.contactInfo} {new Date(complaint.submittedAt).toLocaleDateString()}
{complaint.status.replace('-', ' ').toUpperCase()} {complaint.priority.toUpperCase()}
))}
{/* Additional Stats */}

Volunteer Statistics

Active Volunteers {stats.activeVolunteers}
Total Tasks {stats.totalTasks}
Completed Tasks {stats.completedTasks}
Completion Rate {stats.totalTasks > 0 ? Math.round((stats.completedTasks / stats.totalTasks) * 100) : 0}%

Quick Actions

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
